verses.verse: Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

When a man <S%H376><s%> vows <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> or swears <S%H7650><s%> an oath <S%H7621><s%> to bind <S%H631><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> with a bond, <S%H632><s%> he shall not break <S%H2490><s%> his word; <S%H1697><s%> he shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that proceeds <S%H3318><s%> out of his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

"Also when a woman <S%H802><s%> vows <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and binds <S%H631><s%> herself by a bond, <S%H632><s%> being in her father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> in her youth, <S%H5271><s%>

and her father <S%H1><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> her vow, <S%H5088><s%> and her bond <S%H632><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> and her father <S%H1><s%> holds his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her; <S%H5088><s%> then all her vows shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and every bond <S%H632><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if her father <S%H1><s%> disallow <S%H5106><s%> her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he hears, <S%H8085><s%> none of her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or of her bonds <S%H632><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> shall stand: <S%H6965><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will forgive <S%H5545><s%> her, <S%H1><s%> because her father disallowed her. <S%H5106><s%>

"If she has a husband, <S%H376><s%> while her vows <S%H5088><s%> are on her, <S%H4008><s%> or the rash utterance of her lips, <S%H8193><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%>

and her husband <S%H376><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H2790><s%> and hold his peace at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he hears <S%H8085><s%> it; <S%H5088><s%> then her vows shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and her bonds <S%H632><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> forbids <S%H5106><s%> her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he hears <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H4008><s%> then he shall make void her vow which is on her, and the rash utterance of her lips, <S%H8193><s%> with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul: <S%H5315><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will forgive her. <S%H5545><s%>

"But the vow <S%H5088><s%> of a widow, <S%H490><s%> or of her who is divorced, <S%H1644><s%> everything with which she has bound <S%H631><s%> her soul, <S%H5315><s%> shall stand against her. <S%H6965><s%>
"If she vowed <S%H5087><s%> in her husband <S%H376><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> or bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> by a bond <S%H632><s%> with an oath, <S%H7621><s%>

and her husband <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H2790><s%> and held his peace at her, <S%H5106><s%> and didn't disallow her; <S%H5088><s%> then all her vows shall stand, <S%H6965><s%> and every bond <S%H632><s%> with which she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> made <S%H6565><s%> them null and void <S%H6565><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> them, <S%H4161><s%> then whatever proceeded out of her lips <S%H8193><s%> concerning her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or concerning the bond <S%H632><s%> of her soul, <S%H5315><s%> shall not stand: <S%H6965><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> has made them void; <S%H6565><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will forgive her. <S%H5545><s%>

Every vow, <S%H5088><s%> and every binding <S%H632><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> the soul, <S%H5315><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> may establish <S%H6965><s%> it, <S%H376><s%> or her husband may make it void. <S%H6565><s%>

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> altogether <S%H2790><s%> hold his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her from day <S%H3117><s%> to day, <S%H3117><s%> then he establishes <S%H6965><s%> all her vows, <S%H5088><s%> or all her bonds, <S%H632><s%> which are on her: <S%H6965><s%> he has established them, <S%H2790><s%> because he held his peace at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard them. <S%H8085><s%>
But if he shall make <S%H6565><s%> them null and void <S%H6565><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that he has heard <S%H8085><s%> them, <S%H5375><s%> then he shall bear her iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>"

These are the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> between a man <S%H376><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> between a father <S%H1><s%> and his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> being in her youth, <S%H5271><s%> in her father <S%H1><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>
